General.Name: Hailir Pesticides and Chemicals Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Hailir Pesticides and Chemicals Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of pesticides, intermediates, and functional fertilizers in China. It offers pesticide preparations including insecticides, fungicides, herbicides, and other series of varieties; pesticide technical materials, such as imidacloprid, acetamiprid, pyraclostrobin, emamectin benzoate, clothianidin, propylthio conazole, diafenthiuron, chlorfenapyr, and difenoconazole; pesticide intermediates comprising dichloride; and water-soluble fertilizers that includes amino acids. Hailir Pesticides and Chemicals Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.
